title: Plant extract preparation and green synthesis of silver nanoparticles using Swertia chirata: Characterization and antimicrobial activity against selected human pathogens
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Muhammad Adnan Shereen, Aftab Ahmad, Hashir Khan, Sadia Mehmood Satti, Abeer Kazmi, Nadia Bashir, Muhammad Shehroz, Shahid Hussain, Muhammad Ilyas, M. Ijaz Khan, Hatoon A. Niyazi, Ferjeni Zouidi
